subject: What's the best way to enhance Assert?
msgSnippet: What is the best/recommended way to add enhancements to the framework s Assert class?  In other words, how does one add exta assertion methods (which are more
messageBody:
What is the best/recommended way to add enhancements to the
framework's
Assert class? In other words, how does one add exta assertion
methods (which
are more specialized than the current ones) to the framework?

A. Should one first create a sub-class of Assert then change
TestCase's parent
to be one's new Assert sub-class?

B. Or should one tack on one's custom Assert class to exterior of
the
framework (i.e.-make one's custom Assert class a sub-class TestCase
then
make one's unit tests a sub-class of the custom Assert class)?

C. Or there is another way which I haven't thought of?

I wish to find a way to add specialized assert methods without
corrupting the
simplicty of the framework and in a way which is flexible. Since, I
may or may not
need all the specialized assert methods in all projects I don't want
them hanging
about all the time and cluttering up the framework.

Thanks,

Anthony
